database.pg_version: PostgreSQL 18.1 (Debian 18.1-1.pgdg12+2) on x86_64-pc-linux-gnu, compiled by gcc (Debian 12.2.0-14+deb12u1) 12.2.0, 64-bit

functions.name: check_ui_visibility
functions.arguments: p_user_id uuid, p_resource text, p_action text DEFAULT 'view'::text

functions.name: get_active_project_members
functions.return_type: TABLE(user_id uuid, full_name text, email text, role character varying, can_edit boolean, joined_at timestamp with time zone)

functions.name: get_estimate_statistics
functions.return_type: TABLE(items_count bigint, works_count bigint, materials_count bigint, total_quantity numeric, base_total numeric, final_total numeric)

functions.name: gin_extract_query_trgm
functions.arguments: text, internal, smallint, internal, internal, internal, internal

functions.name: gin_trgm_consistent
functions.arguments: internal, smallint, text, integer, internal, internal, internal, internal

functions.name: gin_trgm_triconsistent
functions.arguments: internal, smallint, text, integer, internal, internal, internal

functions.name: regexp_match
functions.arguments: string citext, pattern citext, flags text

functions.name: regexp_matches
functions.arguments: string citext, pattern citext, flags text

functions.name: regexp_replace
functions.arguments: string citext, pattern citext, replacement text

functions.name: regexp_replace
functions.arguments: string citext, pattern citext, replacement text, flags text

functions.name: regexp_split_to_array
functions.arguments: string citext, pattern citext, flags text

functions.name: regexp_split_to_table
functions.arguments: string citext, pattern citext, flags text

functions.name: set_session_context
functions.arguments: p_user_id uuid, p_tenant_id uuid DEFAULT NULL::uuid

rlsPolicies.qual:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM estimates e
  WHERE ((e.id = estimate_items.estimate_id) AND ((e.tenant_id = current_tenant_id()) OR is_super_admin()))))

rlsPolicies.with_check:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM estimates e
  WHERE ((e.id = estimate_items.estimate_id) AND (e.tenant_id = current_tenant_id()))))

   FROM estimates e
  WHERE ((e.id = estimate_items.estimate_id) AND ((e.tenant_id = current_tenant_id()) OR is_super_admin()))))

   FROM projects
